txt.en: This scroll bestows the Virtues of the Valar quest, which will provide you with several tokens to improve your Virtues.\n\nYou must be at least level 105 to accept this quest.

Complete this quest to receive tokens which will allow you to advance your Virtues to an appropriate tier for level 104 and higher.

<rgb=#FFFF00>Important: Make sure to select each virtue you wish to advance before using the virtue items!
 -> Open Traits Panel: 'j' 
 -> Select Tab: Virtue Traits
 -> Select Virtue</rgb>
Virtues of the Valar - for level 105 and higher
This quest grants several tokens that are used to advance each of your virtues to your new level. \n\nMake sure to select the virtue(s) to advance before consuming each token.
You may complete this quest at any time.
